Title: HOW I CREATE CONTENT IN THE GYM - My 5 Best Tips & Don'ts!

Content.Knowledge Point: The importance of planning and consistency in content creation
Content.Text: Many times when I get to the gym, I have a plan, but many times I don't have a plan. So I'm like what is my idea behind my videos? And that's what I was gonna try to show you that today just how I create content. What you need to do as I am a professional.

Content.Knowledge Point: The use of equipment and angles in content creation
Content.Text: You need a tripod. So we're gonna go to the first exercise and I'm gonna give you next tips. I am training upper body. Which means that can't have the tripod too low? I also like to create content in different angles.

Content.Knowledge Point: The importance of editing and captions
Content.Text: The caption is obviously really important. As you might understand, the man behind the camera is the one recording and editing for YouTube. But for Instagram, I do all my videos myself. I edit all my videos on either my phone or computer, mostly on my phone because it's easier to move around.
